REDEFINING THE SEARCH EXPERIENCE FOR COMMERCE CUSTOMERS WITH SOLR
The On-Demand Webinar Replay of this webinar is now available
VIEW REPLAY
 
WEBINARS Check out our Webinar Depot for latest updates | Check it Out!!
 
 
Comprehensive Search capabilities give your customers the power to navigate through your Commerce Site on their own terms. In today’s Application Economy, Users have minimum tolerance for poor performance (or) bad experiences, and are not hesitant to look for other alternatives. With a large magnitude of products, finding what they really want might be cumbersome and the lack of a search option might lead them leaving your site.
 
In this On-Demand Webinar hear from our Commerce experts speak about the importance of a Search Option in your Commerce Site and how you can use SOLR to enable a beautiful customer experience. With Apache SOLR 4.7.0, you can enable parallel pre-processing and distributed indexing, price indexing and facets, search result product grouping and auto suggestions as well.
Access On-Demand Webinar
